title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / handeye catch
description: hand eye coordination bubble to catch the wildflowers

dialogueTree.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Just as you look at the flowers, a..."
dialogueTree.text: Just as you look at the flowers, a gust of wind raises them from the roof, picking them up in the air...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You catch a single white flower bet..."
links.text: You catch a single white flower between your fingers. The rest fly off into the wind. It's a may bell!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you an acknowl..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you an acknowledging little nod.

links.title: You: "Snap your finger pistols at him."
links.text: Snap your finger pistols at him.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your 9mm semiautomatic finger pisto..."
links.text: Your 9mm semiautomatic finger pistols produce a satisfying snap. (Strange for such a low calibre finger-gun to sound so chunky.) The flower in your hand is impressed. So is Kim.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "That's not entirely true, the lieut..."
links.text: That's not entirely true, the lieutenant is looking at the door to the east and mostly misses them.

links.title: You: "Snap your finger pistols at the you..."
links.text: Snap your finger pistols at the young woman.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your 9mm semiautomatic finger pisto..."
links.text: Your 9mm semiautomatic finger pistols make two satisfying snaps. (Strange for such a small calibre of finger pistol to sound so chunky.) The flower in your hand is impressed. So is she.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "That's not actually true -- she's l..."
links.text: That's not actually true -- she's looking toward the yard and doesn't notice them. Which is probably for the best, because didn't someone mention she's a rape victim?

links.title: You: "Don't snap finger pistols at all."
links.text: Don't snap finger pistols at all.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Probably for the best -- your 9mm s..."
links.text: Probably for the best -- your 9mm semiautomatic finger pistols are not a toy to be waved around.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The young woman looks at the may be..."
links.text: The young woman looks at the may bell in your hand -- just a glance -- then takes a drag of her cigarette.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "...the wind brushes them off the ro..."
links.text: ...the wind brushes them off the roof. They're gone.
